Package projectclasses

Class ModifyMemberRecords

java.lang.Object
projectclasses.ModifyMemberRecords
public class ModifyMemberRecords extends Object
This class is the controller for an Operator to manipulate member records.
Author:
Jaylon Sanders

  • Method Details

    • addNewMember

      public boolean addNewMember(Member memberToAdd)
      This method adds a new member to the records if the member has not already been added.
      Parameters:
      memberToAdd - The member that is being added to the records.
      Returns:
      Returns true if adding was successful,returns false when the member is in the system.

    • deleteResignedMember

      public boolean deleteResignedMember(int memNum)
      This method deletes a resigned member from the records given their member number.
      Parameters:
      memNum - The member number of the member being deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true when the member was successfully deleted. Returns false if the member is not in the system or if they did not resign.

    • modifyMemberRecords

      public boolean modifyMemberRecords(int memNum)
      This method modifies a member given their member number. It also allows the user to save or not save their changes
      Parameters:
      memNum - The member number of the member being deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the member is successfully modified. Returns false if the member is not in the system.

    • containsDigit

      public boolean containsDigit(String searchString)
      This method searches for an digit inside of the given string.
      Parameters:
      searchString - The string that is being searched through.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the string contains a digit. Returns false if the string does not contain a digit.

    • containsSpecialCharacter

      public boolean containsSpecialCharacter(String searchString)
      This method verifies if each char in a string is a letter.
      Parameters:
      searchString - The string that is being searched through.
      Returns:
      Returns true if a special character is found in the string (bar '.' and ' '). Returns false if there are no special characters.

    • containsSpecialAddress

      public boolean containsSpecialAddress(String searchString)
      This method verifies if each char in a string is a letter (Not including numbers).
      Parameters:
      searchString - The string that is being searched through.
      Returns:
      Returns true if a special character is found in the string (bar '.' and ' '). Returns false if the string does not have any errors

    • containsEmailError

      public boolean containsEmailError(String searchString)
      This method verifies if there is exactly one '@' in a string and returns true there are multiple '@' found, returns false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      searchString - The string that is being searched through.
      Returns:
      Returns true if there are multiple '@' found. Returns false only one '@' is found.
